text: In this paper , we use data from the 2010 CTS database for Great Britain , provided by the Department for the Environment , Food and Rural Affairs ( Defra ) via the Animal and Plant Health Agency . If multiple animals were moved on the same day from one farm to another , this was treated as one movement ; markets were initially not explicitly included . Slaughterhouses were considered as sinks , and therefore movements to slaughterhouses were ignored even when going through a livestock market . In total , there were 70 243 farms and 327 markets in our dataset , with 856 454 movements in total . A total of 635 016 movements passed through markets , with 47 692 farms using cattle markets at least once during 2010 .
